title: Retro Music Bundle
description: Blow some air in those cartridges, the retro sound is here! A collection of 3 albums in multiple genres spanning 20 tracks and 48 minutes at a permanent 30% off.
longDescription:
16 Bit Revival Click here to listen to the album preview

Retro Racer Click here to listen to the album preview

Retro Polka Click here to listen to the album preview


Dust off the classic consoles, grab that retro controller, turn on the CRT TV and let the nostalgia sink in, dude! A bundle full of memories straight from the 90's, combining retro sounds generated from the sound boards of classic consoles and packaged in a bit more of a modern approach (eh eh, a bit more, get it? shows himself out), to capture and recreate that warm, fuzzy feeling of childhood alongside the Japanese style of melodies typical of the era. A blast from the past!


19 tracks spanning 46 minutes of original music in multiple genres. Since the nature of the material loop-based, this is excellent for in-game background music.


Award-winning composer for video games and films, Lex is a game lover to the core, and his wish is to fuse them with his love for music, therefore if you desire to collaborate or have any inquiries/custom requests, don't hesitate to contact at resonantinfinity@gmail.com, or browse his profile for more awesome music.


A toast to creativity!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  AAA quality, professionally mixed and mastered tracks
  •  8/16 bit style instruments used from sound modules of classic systems
  •  Catchy AF!

Number of Audio Wavs: 19

Number of Audio Cues: 19

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 46

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
